alert.note: Alert for Colorado (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 14 at 5:51PM CDT until September 14 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Colorado County in southeastern Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 551 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fayetteville, or 10 miles southeast of La Grange, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Frelsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
